Posts.Title: I am Humbled Fitztwins irish22

Posts.Content: Mar 5, 2011 12:00PM Dravastorm wrote: I just finished this combo three weeks ago. I too had random pains after treatment for a couple of months. My pains were in the same areas as the cancer though; my liver. What I found was helpful was to log symptoms and side effects to see what might be causing what. I also bought a blood pressure cuff so that I could check my blood pressure because avastin can cause it to rise. I also made sure and kept hydrated. Water, water, water. May I where your cancer has metastisized to?Â
